subject: Computer Science and Computing: The WSEAS Press publishes high quality Textbooks for Educational Purposes or Research Monographs (see below)
body:
(write WSEAS in the Subject, when you reply)

Dear Prof.Dr.Tudhope,

The usual great participation in the WSEAS Conference on Computers
(July 2007) does not leave us margins to accept more papers. So, we
cannot give any other prolongation in the deadline.

Therefore, if you did not catch the deadline for the WSEAS Conference
on Computers (July 2007), you can upload now your paper(s) to the
WSEAS Conferences on Computer Science(August 2007), www.wseas.org,  in
Vouliagmeni Beach (20Kms only outside Athens) and 15 minutes by car
from the Athens International Airport.
Last year in Vouliagmeni , we had received more than 1200 papers
and from them only 600 papers were accepted and presented in this
multiconference of 2006.
See: http://www.worldses.org/reports/10th


Vouliagmeni Beach, Athens, Greece, August 24-26, 2007 

* 7th WSEAS Int. Conf. on APPLIED INFORMATICS AND COMMUNICATIONS
(AIC'07) http://www.wseas.org/conferences/2007/athens/aic

* 7th WSEAS Int. Conf. on SIGNAL PROCESSING, COMPUTATIONAL GEOMETRY
and  ARTIFICIAL VISION (ISCGAV'07)
http://www.wseas.org/conferences/2007/athens/iscgav

*7th WSEAS Int. Conf. on SYSTEMS THEORY AND SCIENTIFIC COMPUTATION
(ISTASC'07)
http://www.wseas.org/conferences/2007/athens/istasc


Please, upload your paper now
until May 15.
              www.wseas.org
			  
None extension in the deadline (May 15, 2007) will be given.


Another really important conference, with several Plenary and Invited
Speakers, Special Sessions, etc... is the
EUROPEAN COMPUTING CONFERENCE that is co-organized by IARAS and WSEAS
with the Co-Sponsorship of Several European Universities
http://www.iaras.org/ecc2007/

For the European Computing Conference the last day that you can upload
your paper is also: MAY 15, 2006.
None other extension will be given.
(Several European Projects will be presented by IARAS Staff)


For all the other WSEAS Conferences of 2007, the deadlines exist on
the web and NONE extension will be given. 
For example, the WSEAS Conferences of October 2007 in Arcachon, France
have deadline: June 15 and none extension will be given.

The WSEAS Press publishes high quality Textbooks following one of the
next Policies:
-------------------------------------------
POLICY 1):  The WSEAS Press publishes high quality Textbooks in a
particular number of copies and can deliver them to the author(s) for
promoting themselves in the international university community.
WSEAS can also undertake to include them in several international
indexes. 

Review process:  The full text is sent to five international reviewers
and after 3 months the author(s) receive(s) the reviewers' comments
with the recommendation of the Associate Editor for publication or
not. At the same time interval of these 3 months the author(s) must
not negotiate(s) the publication of the book with any other
international publisher.


POLICY 2):  The WSEAS Press can publish them and can promote them
internationally through the usual WSEAS Channels.
WSEAS can also undertake to include them in several international
indexes. 

Review process:  The full text is sent to five international reviewers
and after 3 months the author(s) receive(s) the reviewers' comments
with the recommendation of the Associate Editor for publication or
not. At the same time interval of these 3 months the author(s) must
not negotiate(s) the publication of the book with any other
international publisher.





ADDITIONAL FEATURES FOR THE WSEAS CONFERENCES OF AUGUST 2007
www.wseas.org


1) Publication of the Proceedings in 3 media: hard-copy, CD, E-Library
----------------------------------------------------------------------
(A) Hard-Copy Proceedings (Book) with ISBN and ISSN indexed by the
major Citation Indexes: www.worldses.org/indexes

(B) CD-ROM Proceedings with pages' numbers with ISBN and ISSN 
    indexed  by the major Citation Indexes: www.worldses.org/indexes

(C) E-Library:  http://www.wseas.org/online

and possible:

  (D) JOURNAL PUBLICATION: Authors of high - quality papers of
archival value are invited to send extended versions of their papers
to the international WSEAS Journals after the conference. Necessary
Condition is the presentation of the paper in the congress


2) A very strong and important feature is that the WSEAS is going to
give you a new username and password WITHOUT EXPIRY DATE for on-line
access in the WSEAS Conference proceedings FOR EVER.

       
3) We have already arranged and each of you will receive in the CD-ROM
Proceedings, not only the Proceedings of these WSEAS conferences of
2007 , but also the Proceedings of the same conferences in 2006 in
Greece. Except the CD-ROM proceedings you will also receive Books
(Hard-Copy) Proceedings with all the papers of the Multiconference 
  *** (MORE than 600 pages per volume!!!) ***

4) Because we will maintain the same policy in 2008, your paper will
be available and readable in the CD-ROM that we will distribute in
Germany in August of 2008 where we will have the same conferences.
 

5) After the presentation of your paper we are going to consider it
for possible publication in the WSEAS Journals that, as you know,
participate in all the International Scientific Indices (Elsevier,
Scopus, EI, Compendex, INSPEC, CSA .... see: www.worldses.org/indexes 
  )


6) Rich cultural and social part as usual in WSEAS events.
The importance of these conferences can be proved by the impact
of these conferences in 2006: See, please
http://www.wseas.us/reports
See other reports at:  http://www.wseas.us/reports


7) The conference Books (Hard-Copy Proceedings), CD-ROM proceedings
and (Journals with selected papers) published by WSEAS Press continue
to sell for a long time after the meeting has taken place. This is
another demonstration of the prestige the scientific community
attribute to the meetings organised by the WSEAS.


8) WSEAS has arranged collaboration with Hindawi Publishing Corp
http://www.hindawi.com and Springer Verlag,
so, several papers will appear in Volumes of Hindawi Publishing
and Springer Verlag. The authors can select between WSEAS Journals,
Springer Verlag Volumes and Hindawi Publishing Company, however, this
requires presentation of your paper in the conference, submission
of extended version after the conference and additional review and
revision. As you can see we have already started a collaboration with
the Springer verlag and enhanced and revised versions of these
presented papers might appear in Springer Verlag volumes after the
Conference.


All the best

Panos Danilakis
